briefdescription.para: Create LED strip based on SPI MOSI channel.

simplesect.para: Although only the MOSI line is used for generating the signal, the whole SPI bus can't be used for other purposes.

listitem.para: ESP_OK: create LED strip handle successfully
ESP_ERR_INVALID_ARG: create LED strip handle failed because of invalid argument
ESP_ERR_NOT_SUPPORTED: create LED strip handle failed because of unsupported configuration
ESP_ERR_NO_MEM: create LED strip handle failed because of out of memory
ESP_FAIL: create LED strip handle failed because some other error
